name: 2022 7th International Conference on Control, Robotics and Cybernetics
content: Publication: All submitted papers must be written in English. Accepted papers will be published in CRC 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases. CRC 2022 is listed in official IEEE Conference Calendar.
